column5: For those of you  who use them and happen to be going by a CTC store starting tomorrow, Friday, the regularly priced knives at $24.99 are on sale for $9.99.  just sayin'
this would make a great Hanukkah present
A little late for that unless you meant to say Passover. What the heck...it's never too late to give a gift to someone.
Are they the folding fillet knives Roy or are they made by some other?
No, these are the flexible 6" blade, no-slip grip handle..includes the sheath and sharpener.  EDIT!  Oops, this is not on sale  for the whole week...this is just Saturday's door crasher. (March 20th)
Great knife, I have like 5 of them...  Cheap, and very sharp, couldn't be more satisfied with them. Go grab one. (or another)

i have had one for about 2 years, they are a great little knife but i dont like it much. the end of the handle rubs on the table to much when skinning fish but other then that a good knife, just personal peference
I grabbed one for the cottage a couple of years ago. I think they do the same sale every year. Can't go wrong for the price.
I got one for the same deal last year.  I like the knife, but the sharpening tool that comes with them is garbage..
yup-if anyone knows anything about the Jewish holidays its Roy.
lets hope these knives are sharper than you were with catching that joke
